meanings.definition: A person or thing that builds up or improves something.
meanings.sent1: The upbuilders in our community work hard to make our town a better place.
meanings.sent2: The upbuilders renovated the old library, turning it into a modern community center.
meanings.sent3: The upbuilders decided to paint the town pink, much to everyone's surprise.
meanings.sent4: The upbuilders were like superheroes, swooping in to save the day with their construction skills.
meanings.sent5: The upbuilders were like magicians, transforming the rundown park into a vibrant playground.

meanings.definition: Plural form of upbuilder: people or things that build up or improve something.
meanings.sent1: We owe a lot to the upbuilders who have dedicated their time to our neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The upbuilders gathered materials to start the construction project in the community.
meanings.sent3: The upbuilders threw a surprise party to celebrate the completion of the new school building.
meanings.sent4: The upbuilders were like a well-oiled machine, working together seamlessly to achieve their goals.
meanings.sent5: The upbuilders were the unsung heroes of the town, quietly making it a better place for all.
